document_title: Gnathostomiasis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_name: benh-giun-dau-gai.json_9_Factors that increase the risk of disease
subsection_content: People living in environments with endemic gnathostomiasis; People traveling to places with sources of disease, eating and drinking uncooked dishes such as: salad, raw freshwater fish, eels, frogs, frogs, reptiles...; People who work frequently in contact with fresh food contaminated with gnathostome larvae; People who process freshwater fish, frogs, frogs, eels... but do not wear protective gloves...
subsection_title: benh giun dau gai.json. Factors that increase the risk of disease
subsection_data:
benh giun dau gai.json. Factors that increase the risk of disease
People living in environments with endemic gnathostomiasis; People traveling to places with sources of disease, eating and drinking uncooked dishes such as: salad, raw freshwater fish, eels, frogs, frogs, reptiles...; People who work frequently in contact with fresh food contaminated with gnathostome larvae; People who process freshwater fish, frogs, frogs, eels... but do not wear protective gloves...
